name: 4th World Congress on Nursing and Patient Healthcare Nursing Congress 2022
content: We feel immensed pleasure to invite you for our impending 4th World Congress on Nursing and Patient Healthcare-Hybrid Event which is going to be held during June 13-15, 2022 at London, UK. Nursing Conference 2022 aims to be one of the important conferences for presenting novel, essential, comprehensive update on advancements and contrivances in the area of Nursing. We hope it'll be an excellent opening for scholars to meet and bat with premier investigators. It serves the information necessaries of business, Professionals, academics& government.
